name: The Bond Of Life
description:
The Bond Of Life

There was once a widow with a dying son on her side. No medicine man would take him for she has no money to provide. Due to her desperation, she shouted and begged. And before she passed out, something or someone has answered her request. It connected her life to her son so that it may walk and jumped again. It then instructed her to go to the very end of the screen so that her son may fully heal. It also warned her to always let her son be near, so that the spell may not be broken and death not take them away.   

--THE MOTHERS CONTROLS KEYS--

UP ARROW ---------- JUMP

LEFT ARROW-------- WALK TOWARDS LEFT

RIGHT ARROW ----- WALK TOWARDS RIGHT

-- THE CHILD'S CONTROL KEYS--

W ------------------ JUMP

A------------------- WALK TOWARDS LEFT

D ------------------ WALK TOWARDS RIGHT
